    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    ValueWithAttributes Policy

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:Policy

      • Description

        Policy information regarding the ancillary for example Power Cart rental policy.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Policy type="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Policy" : {
    "value" : null,
    "type" : "Example String Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        type
        The type of the policy, such as "Tee Time" or "Cart Rental".
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
